ConfigurationOption.Value: select m.itemnum, m.description, m.quantity, iv.issueunit, m.curbal, m.fromstoreloc, m.frombin, m.fromlot, m.fromconditioncode, m.tostoreloc, m.tobin, m.tolot, m.enterby, m.transdate, m.siteid, m.orgid, m.matrectransid, iv.inventoryid from matrectrans m left join inventory iv on m.itemnum = iv.itemnum and m.fromstoreloc = iv.location and m.siteid = iv.siteid and m.orgid = iv.orgid where m.issuetype = 'TRANSFER'

Struct._value: := query( 'Inventory Balances', 'Current Balance', 'inventoryid = ${inventoryid} and Bin = ${From Bin}' )

ConfigurationOption.Value: Invalid Quantity! Quantity must be greater than 0
The quantity to transfer is more than the current balance!

EventAction.Condition: IsInsert() and ${From Storeroom} = ${To Storeroom} and ${From Bin} = ${To Bin} and ${From Lot} = ${To Lot}

ConfigurationOption.Value: To and From locations are the same!
